com.mumfrey.liteloader.api

Interface ModInfoDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CustomisationProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LiteLoaderModInfoDecorator

    public interface ModInfoDecorator
extends CustomisationProvider
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Branding Provider Decorator for ModInfo classes, to alter the appearance of ModInfo entries in the mod list.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addIcons(ModInfo<?> mod, java.util.List<IconTextured> icons)
      Add icons to the mod list entry for this mod
      java.lang.String modifyStatusText(ModInfo<?> mod, java.lang.String statusText)
      Allows this decorator to modify the status text for the specified mod, return null if no modification required.
      void onDrawListEntry(int mouseX, int mouseY, float partialTicks, int xPosition, int yPosition, int width, int height, boolean selected, ModInfo<?> mod, int gradientColour, int titleColour, int statusColour)
      Allow decorators to draw custom content on the mod list entries

    • Method Detail

      • modifyStatusText

        java.lang.String modifyStatusText(ModInfo<?> mod,
                                  java.lang.String statusText)
        Allows this decorator to modify the status text for the specified mod, return null if no modification required.
        Parameters:
        statusText -
        Returns:
        new status text or NULL to indicate the text should remain default
